answers.answer: Part of it sounds like diabetes. Another part of sounds like a hyperthyroidism. With hyperthyroidism everythings is excelerated. Those are my thoughts. I hope you find your answer.Paula

question: I'm 41 years old and experiencing alot of weird symptoms.  7 years ago I had elevated liver enyzmes and they took out my gall bladder.  I have had since that time dumping syndrome as a result of the surgery.  Then 2 years ago I started experiencing prostate pain and frequent urination issues as well as sometimes painful ejaculation.  They treated me for prostatitis.  For the last several years I've had chronic sinuitis and had sinus surgery almost 2 years ago that did nothing for me.  So lately when I get sinus infection I seem to have prostate issues.  Last summer I lost 20 lbs in a 2 week period while building our home and chalked it up to just working hard thinking it would come back once I slowed down...it didn't and I keep loosing.  So here I am today with sinus infection, wheezing, prostate pain, frequent urination (12 times in the night the other night) stop and go flow, elevated liver enyzmes, anal itching ( I feel like that dog dragging his butt on the floor ) excessive sweating, and extreme fatigue.  I'm scheduled for a CT sinus scan, chest xray and ultrasound of my liver for this week.  Blood and urine tests seemed fine with the exception of liver enyzmes.  appt. with a urologist scheduled for next week.  Any help/advise appreciated.
title: Falling apart
